snippet.title: Hello Kitty episode 1 Hello Kitty Detective Games My Melody Sanrio Gameplay Walkthrough iOS Android
snippet.description:
Hello Kitty episode 1 Hello Kitty Detective Games My Melody Kuromi Gudetama Sanrio
Gameplay Walkthrough iOS Android

Hello Kitty Detective Games Gameplay Walkthrough Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MIuIJK2j4LA&list=PL5gijBeYNm4VMgJcMOItAxGqmTGOxOpg7

Like and Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp7wYCrg4jHX7E9Y2YZbhrA

Hello Kitty Detective Games 
Download on Apple App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/hello-kitty-detective-games/id1265515778
Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.edujoy.HelloKitty.Detective&hl=en_US

“
Edujoy presents Hello Kitty Detective Games for kids! Help Hello Kitty find all the objects and become the best detective! Test your visual skills and improve your concentration with this fun game for all ages.


Play with your favorite Sanrio characters and have fun while playing. The challenge is to find items, memorize objects and show that you have what it takes to complete all the puzzles and mazes.


10 GAMES IN 1


Discover all the awesome games that are included in this app!


- Find the Hidden Objects

- Find the 10 differences

- Find the items

- Complete the scene

- Match the shapes

- Solve the maze

- Whack the mole

- Memorize and find what’s new

- Match the correct side

- Word Search


Hello Kitty Detective games is an educational game so that your children can develop intellectual skills and have fun at the same time.


As they grow, babies and young children learn to discern information from the environment that is significant to them. Good visual perceptual skills are important for many everyday skills such as reading, writing, completing puzzles, cutting, drawing, completing math problems, as well as many other skills. Hello Kitty Detective games, help kids to improve their attention skills and to learn how to differentiate colors, shapes and identificate objects and animals.


GAME FEATURES


Educational content

Develop visual and perception skills

Made by professional educators

Up to 10 games in 1

Free to play with additional content available via in-app purchases


ABOUT EDUJOY


All our games are created by professional educators and psychologists in order to provide pedagogical content, necessary for the intellectual development of babies and children.


Our mission is to help parents and teachers in their educational endeavors with young children, offering them top-quality learning applications.


We love creating educational and fun games for you. If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to send us feedback or leave a comment.
“

Please like and subscribe to make GrumpySloth happy! If enough subscribers the channel name will turn into HappySloth :)
